titleStmt.title: The woman to the plow and the man to the hen-roost, or, A fine way to cure a cot-quean the tune is, I have for all good wives a song.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thakeray and T. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
